errors.error_description: The `conda` installation commands are in the wrong order. `conda install spotpy` is executed before adding the `conda-forge` channel, which will cause the installation to fail as the package may not be in the default channels.
correction_candidates: Move `conda install spotpy` to be the last command in the sequence.
Combine the commands into one: `conda install -c conda-forge spotpy --channel-priority strict`
Remove the `conda config` commands and use `conda install -c conda-forge spotpy`.
The order is correct, but the channel should be `defaults`.
errors.golden_answer: Move `conda install spotpy` to be the last command in the sequence.
